attributes.action: Meet with His Holiness The Dalai Lama
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please do not dishonour the British people by caving into pressure from the Chinese Government or fear of upsetting our trade with China and refusing to meet with His Holiness when he arrives in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
